Detailed Description

Simple record. It has default destructor, copy constructor, assignment because there are no pointers.

Member Function Documentation

unsigned  pad,
unsigned long  recNum,
const timespec  tick
)  [virtual]
 

Fill the record with suitable artificial values

Parameters:
nowStr C-string containing the current time in ISO format
pad amount to pad some fields by (in range 0-99)
recNum the current record number
tick the current time in internal form

XDR_BOOLEAN SimpleRecord::xdrBOOLEAN
 

1 byte value which contains 0 for FALSE and 1 for TRUE

an integer in the range[-128,127]
